You love Truth or Dab and the even spicier refresh edition . And
now we 're turning up the temperature and raising the stakes with our brand new Hot Ones
roulette . It 's an explosively hilarious push your luck party game filled with suspense ,
consequence , and of course , hot sauce . The game is simple . Roll the dice of doom ,
flip a card , and try to avoid the dab at all costs . Hotwinds roulette is available at
wildertoys.com . That 's wildertoys.com to get your hands on Hot Ones Roulette . Godspeed
and be careful around the eyes .
